name: Spunchers.io
description: Spunchers.io is a multiplayer 2D shooter game running on browsers that allows you to play three different game modes: Free for All (individual), Team Deathmatch and Capture the Flag. In the same way, it includes five different characters with different sprite animations and shooting abilities. The game currently provides support for mobile devices and has Progressive Web App features making it feel app-like on mobile and desktop too.
